doc.previous: TCAS works in a coordinated manner so when an RA is issued to conflicting aircraft a required action i e Climb Climb has to be immediately performed by one of the aircraft while the other one receives a similar RA in the opposite direction i e Descend Descend
doc.after: TCAS II issues the following types of aural annunciations
doc.after_weights: TCAS|1 II|0.88889 issues|0.77778 the|0.66667 following|0.55556 types|0.44444 of|0.33333 aural|0.22222 annunciations|0.11111 |0
